abstract: In a bid as high-profile and potentially contentious as News Corporation‘s $5 billion offer for Dow Jones & Company, it’s only natural that the players in the drama would reach for the big guns. And so they have.
lead_paragraph: In a bid as high-profile and potentially contentious as News Corporation‘s $5 billion offer for Dow Jones & Company, it’s only natural that the players in the drama would reach for the big guns. And so they have.

headline.main: Advisers Suit Up for Dow Jones Showdown
